metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7344 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Reflected XSS exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code in the view 'filter' as it insecurely prints the 'filter[Name]' (aka Filter name) value on the web page without applying any proper filtration.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
